---
title: Submission Tutorial
---

To submit your abstract for #CERE205, [click here to access the submission portal](https://cere2025.sciencesconf.org/){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn role="button" data-toggle="tooltip" title="CERE2025 Submission Portal"}.

## Step 1: Log In or Register

::: columns
::: {.column width="60%"}
If you already have an account on [sciencesconf.org](https://cere2025.sciencesconf.org/), simply click **Login**. If not, click on the drop-down arrow and select **Create account**.

::: {.callout-warning title="Email Verification"}
After creating your account, you will receive an email to verify it. If this email does not arrive, it may be due to a typo in the email address provided.
:::

:::
::: {.column width="5%"}
:::
::: {.column width="35%"}
![](../images/step_1.png)
:::
:::

## Step 2: Start a New Submission

::: columns
::: {.column width="60%"}
On the left-hand menu, under MY SPACE, click on **My submissions**. Then, begin the process by selecting **Submit an abstract**.
:::
::: {.column width="5%"}
:::
::: {.column width="35%"}
![](../images/step_2.png)
:::
:::

## Step 3: Complete the Submission Form

::: columns
::: {.column width="60%"}
**Provide all the required details for your submission**, including the title, abstract, submission type (oral presentation, symposium, poster, or data workshop), and the topic. **Add any co-authors if applicable, then review and submit your contribution**.

::: {.callout-warning title="Symposium Submission"}
If you are submitting a symposium, please do not submit each talk individually. Instead, enter the symposium abstract in the text box, followed by each presenter’s abstract along with the authors’ names.
:::

:::
::: {.column width="5%"}
:::
::: {.column width="35%"}
![](../images/step_3.png)
:::
:::

You will be able to **edit your submission up until the review process starts**. Once the review process started, you can track the status of the submission: **Initial, Note, Accepted, Refused and Awaiting update**.

![](../images/step_4.png)

Click [here](https://doc.sciencesconf.org/en/deposer/soumettre.html) for more information.
